query.statement: SELECT ,'' CHK ,VALUE(WBS,'') WBS ,VALUE(COD,'') COD ,VALUE(LIFNR,'') LIFNR ,VALUE(CYN,'') CYN ,VALUE(PAC,'') PAC ,VALUE(JOBNAM,'') JOBNAM ,VALUE(JOBHP,'') JOBHP ,VALUE(ADNAM,'') ADNAM ,VALUE(ADHP,'') ADHP ,VALUE(BEDAT,'') BEDAT ,VALUE(CPDAT,'') CPDAT ,VALUE(EXDAT,'') EXDAT ,VALUE(RMK,'') RMK ,VALUE(CID,'') CID ,VALUE(CDT,'') CDT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST414 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND WBS = #WBS#
